subject: [Radiance-general] Cutting a cylinder, or modeling smoothgeometry...
body:
On 06/02/09, 07:21:26, Lars "O." Grobe <akilog@nus.edu.sg> wrote regarding
[Radiance-general] Cutting a cylinder, or modeling smooth geometry...:

Hello Lars,


Like this?

Small JPEG 20k:
http://www.oxdrove.co.uk/header.jpeg
Large HDR 800k:
http://www.oxdrove.co.uk/header.pic


This is modelled as a mesh with normals.  It was just a practice piece
I did when developing my mesh generator.  The ends are square but could
be angled.



James.
